member.name: P:Kermalis.SimpleGIF.DecodedGIF.Frame.Bitmap
member.summary: Modifying this will not affect any other frames. This is the only exposed to changes because it doesn't affect the library.

member.name: P:Kermalis.SimpleGIF.DecodedGIF.Frame.Delay

member.name: T:Kermalis.SimpleGIF.Decoding.ColorFormat
member.summary: These tell the GifColor how to be written to the output bitmaps. Each color will take 8 bits (one byte), resulting in one uint being used. The letters are arranged in order of low to high bit significance. For example, will have A as the least significant byte and B as the most significant byte.

member.name: P:Kermalis.SimpleGIF.Decoding.GifPalette.TransparencyIndex
member.summary: if there is no transparency in this .
